titles.title: Lord I Believe (very nice - chorus takes a lit

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord I believe - Lord I believe Saviour raise my faith in Thee Till it can move a mountain Lord I believe - Lord I believe All my doubts are buried In the Fountain{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When sorrows and storms Are besetting my track And Satan is whisp'ring You'd better turn back Oh then I have proved it Tho' dark be the way A little believing Drives clouds right away{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How easy when sailing The sea at a calm To trust in the strength Of Jehovah's great arm But somehow I find When the waves swamp the boat It takes some believing To keep things afloat{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I'll stand to the end I have heard people say I'll fight till I die And I'll ne'er run away But when the temptations So fiercely assailed They left off believing And terribly failed{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And others there are Full of courage and zeal Who go to the battle Like warriors of steel But right in the heat Of the conflict with sin Instead of believing They faint and give in{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh let us remember In running our race That faith is not feeling And trust is not trace And when all is seeming As black as the night We'll keep on believing And go on with the fight{/lang-eng}
